Class JungleKing

java.lang.Object
JungleKing
public class JungleKing extends Object
Controls core game logic and player turns. Handles player piece creation and placement. Manages game state and player turns. Handles player selection and starting positions. Determines the first player based on piece strength. Checks for winning moves and opponent defeat.

  • Constructor Details

    • JungleKing

      public JungleKing(Board board)
      Constructs a JungleKing game with the given board. Initializes players and sets up the game board.
      Parameters:
      board - The game board used for the game.

  • Method Details

    • createPlayers

      public void createPlayers()
      Creates player instances with pieces positioned according to defined possible locations.

    • createPieces

      public ArrayList<Piece> createPieces(ArrayList<int[]> positions)
      Creates pieces for the players based on the provided positions. The pieces are created in a fixed order but assigned to random positions.
      Parameters:
      positions - Ordered list of [row, col] positions for the pieces.
      Returns:
      Complete set of pieces for the player.

    • handleStartingPosition

      public boolean handleStartingPosition(int row, int col)
      Handles player position during the first-player determination phase.
      Parameters:
      row - Selected row (x-coordinate) on the board.
      col - Selected column (y-coordinate) on the board.
      Returns:
      true when both players have made valid selections and turn order is set, false if still selecting.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Returns the current player.
      Returns:
      The current player.

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard()
      Returns the board being used in the game.
      Returns:
      The game board.

    • isWinningMove

      public boolean isWinningMove(int x, int y, Player currentPlayer)
      Checks if a move to a specified position is to capture the opponent's home base.
      Parameters:
      x - The target x-coordinate of the move.
      y - The target y-coordinate of the move.
      currentPlayer - The player making the move.
      Returns:
      true if the move captures the opponent's home base, false otherwise.

    • checkOpponentDefeated

      public boolean checkOpponentDefeated(Player currentPlayer)
      Checks if opponent has any remaining pieces on the board.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - The player making the move.
      Returns:
      true if the opponent is defeated (no pieces left), false otherwise.

    • setGameOver

      public void setGameOver(boolean gameOver)
      Updates the game state to indicate if the game is over.

      public void switchTurn()
      Switches the turn to the next player.

      public int getSelectingPlayer()
      Returns the Selecting Player Number.
